name: nasa
title: NASA
description: View the Astronomy Picture of the Day, latest news, astronauts, spacecrafts, and upcoming launches from NASA and other space agencies.
author: mSarheed

commands.name: apod
commands.title: Show Astronomy Picture of the Day
commands.description: Show the Astronomy Picture of the Day from NASA

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: NASA API Key
preferences.description: Get your free API key from https://api.nasa.gov

commands.name: news
commands.title: Show NASA News
commands.description: Show the latest news from NASA

commands.name: astronauts
commands.title: Show Astronauts in Space
commands.description: Show the astronauts currently in space

commands.name: spacecrafts
commands.title: Show Spacecrafts in Space
commands.description: Show the spacecrafts currently in space

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
